H0.text: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner became President of which South American country in December 2007. Brazil

H1.text: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner became President of which South American country in December 2007. Chile

H2.text: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner became President of which South American country in December 2007. Colombia

H3.text: Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner became President of which South American country in December 2007. Argie

A4.text: Cristina Kirchner who won the 2007 and 2011 elections

A5.text: Cristina Elisabet Fernández de Kirchner (née Fernández; born 19 February 1953) is an Argentine lawyer, politician and convicted criminal who served as the 56th President of Argentina from 2007 to 2015.

A6.text: ElHistoriador.com.ar provides information about presidents and ministries of the Argentine Nation.
